title: Birthday Post
author: JGray
text:
Today's page gets posted on that rarest of dates...

My birthday!

Today I am 40 years old.

Yep.

If you're interested in giving me a present, please consider supporting Mysteries of the Arcana via Patreon or, if you are a Pathfinder player, buying a copy of Letters from the Flaming Crab: Winged Cavalry (I have ongoing royalties for that one so I get a percentage of each sale) or even Mysteries of the Arcana volume 1 and 2!

Or, if you want to go the non-material route, leave me a happy birthday comment. I like comments. They make the comic look loved. Comics with no comments feel sad and lonely.

See you Monday!

replies.author: Sario528*Guest*
replies.text: Happy 40th J

replies.author: Aleena*Guest*
replies.text: Happy Birthday, J!

replies.author: JD
replies.text: A very pleasant day to you, Sir Gray, on this fortieth anniversary of the betterment of our species.

replies.author: Fairportfan*Guest*
replies.text: Now that's just teasing the animals.Of course, it's set Chrys's campaign back at least 25%...

replies.author: Gunsolo*Guest*
replies.text: Happy birthday J!

replies.author: Fairportfan*Guest*
replies.text: I just noticed the flower in Panel One.Argh.
